case_title: Muhammad Hayat vs Secretary Social Welfare, Women Development and Special Education Department, Government of Balochistan, Quetta and another
respondent: Secretary Social Welfare, Women Development and Special Education Department, Government of Balochistan, Quetta and another

legal_points.mandatory_conditions: Departmental appeal must be filed before approaching the Tribunal.

key_references.case_law: 2011 P.L.O (C.S) page 526, Gohram Soomro Vs. Secretary Ministry of Education

judgment_summary.reason_for_dismissal: Non-compliance with mandatory conditions under Section 4, Proviso (a) of Balochistan Service Tribunal Act, 1974.
